author: Will Collins
title: Is Viktor Orbán Using the Pandemic to Impose Dictatorial Rule?
description: His new authoritarian policies are worrying those who had up to now defended his conservative-nationalist approach. The post Is Viktor Orbán Using the Pandemic to Impose Dictatorial Rule? appeared first on The American Conservative.
content: His new authoritarian policies are worrying those who had up to now defended his conservative-nationalist approach.Of all the dire predictions made at the outset of the Trump presidency, the idea that the United States had just elected a would-be dictator was… [+5272 chars]
